ingredients.ingredient: 1 ½ (1 ounce) packages dry onion soup mix
1 (10 fluid ounce) bottle Russian-style salad dressing

cookingTips: Layer chicken breasts on the bottom of the slow cooker for even cooking
Mix dressing and preserves for a sweet-tangy glaze that won't burn
Cook on low for 6-8 hours or high for 3-4 hours until chicken reaches 165°F internally
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How does the combination of onion soup mix and Russian dressing complement the apricot preserves in this dish?
